eslint-plugin-fanhub-rules
===================

# Configuration

Just add the plugin into linter's configuration file

```json
  "extends": [
    "eslint-plugin-fanhub-rules"
  ]
```

You can also enable or disable the rules that you would like to use.

```json
  "rules": {
    "jsx-icon-component-name": "error"
  }
```
